Name: Trapped in the Forest
About the game: You awake in a mysterious forest that seems strangely familiar. Have you been here before? Is this a dream or a nightmare? Put your survival skills to the test in this haunting and creepy survival-horror game! Chop down trees, forage for items, hunt for food and build your own base in a forest haunted by an ancient evil. How long can you survive for in the forest?
